data.title: Sean Penn’s younger brother found dead
data.meta_description: The younger brother of the Hollywood actor Sean Penn has been found dead at his home in Santa Monica, California. Chris Penn was a successful character actor, specialising in playing criminals such as
data.text:
The younger brother of the Hollywood actor Sean Penn has been found dead at his home in Santa Monica, California.

Chris Penn was a successful character actor, specialising in playing criminals such as Nice Guy Eddie Cabot in the gory 1992 thriller Reservoir Dogs, a role which provided his acting breakthrough.

His 56 other film credits - he started acting at the age of 12 - include Francis Ford Coppola’s 1983 teen gang move Rumble Fish, a role as Kevin Bacon’s best mate who learns to dance in Footloose in 1984, the Clint Eastwood 1985 Western Pale Rider, Robert Altman’s Short Cuts, Mulholland Falls and the 1998 Jackie Chan action thriller Rush Hour.

More recently he was in the 2004 comedy
